attributes.action: Parliament invites Greta Thunberg to address both houses instead of Donald Trump
attributes.additional_details: Greta Thunberg is a teenage activist concerned about climate change. She would make a much better speech. Donald Trump is Donald Trump.
attributes.background: Trump has been invited for a state visit. Greta Thunberg should be invited instead, and should speak whilst Trump is here.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

We aren't sure exactly what you would like Greta Thunberg to be invited to do or whether you would like Donald Trump's visit to go ahead.

You might like to sign this petition if you would like Donald Trump's visit not to go ahead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258806
